com.navis.framework.portal

Class UserContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.portal.UserContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBriefDiagnostics, com.navis.security.authentication.SecureSessionAware, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArgoUserContext

    public class UserContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.navis.security.authentication.SecureSessionAware, java.io.Serializable, IBriefDiagnostics
    Encapsulates the identity of the user making a BizRequest.

    The persistence patterns will bind a UserContext to the execution thread in the Business Tier.

    UserContext is the base implementation and will be converted to an interface in 2.0 All static methods will be removed in 2.0. DO NOT ADD ANY MORE STATIC METHODS HERE!!!

    To create your application's subclassed version, you will need to declare userContextProvider in your Portal Tier factory.

    See Also:
    Security docs on confluence, Serialized Form

      • getExternalId

        public java.lang.String getExternalId()
        External ID is another userid which may not exist in our system and is used to track audit trail from the outside. i.e. webservice may be called through just one user, but done on behalf of another user
